job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pAt Path we work to develop stateoftheart artificial intelligence machine learning computer vision and sensors systems to make industrial robots intelligent We create world transforming technology like our first robotic welding system allowing hardware to do much more with much less human inputppbrppWe are looking for a machine learning engineer who is eager to find novel solutions and methods to solve challenging problems You will report to the Engineering Manager of AICVML and will join a team of dedicated supportive and enthusiastic people to help create the future of manufacturingppbrppstrongWhat Youll DostrongpulliDesign and apply machine learning algorithms for improving robotic intelligenceliliCreate and apply new approaches to solve computer vision problems in image and 3D data domains signal processing reinforcement learning offline and online motor control and path planningliliDevelop new machine learning algorithms to improve rate of learning generalizability variable reduction increase runtimes or improve applicability to different modalities of dataliliRun machine learning test and experiments and perform statistical analysisnbspliliCollaborate with software and hardware teams to build data and model pipelinesnbspliliStay uptodate with new research and novel findings in machine learningnbspliulpbrppWho You ArepulliYou have 3 years of experience working with machine learning algorithmsliliYou have an advanced degree in in computer science mathematics or related discipline involving computer vision machine learning or artificial intelligenceliliYou have 2 publications with a focus on computer vision deep reinforcement learning or relatedliliYou have research experience that may include deep learning computer vision reinforcement or active learningnbspliliYou understand Tensorflow Theano or Caffe and GPUbased computation in generalliliYou have proficiency in Python or CCliliYou have experience with common image or vision processing libraries OpenCV or PCLliliYou are excited by the opportunity to be a part of a venturebacked startup early on where your work will have an immediate and direct impactliliYou are passionate about what you do and enjoy working in a collaborative environmentliliYou like the idea of working at a tech first company with all the perks that go with that free lunch unlimited time off team events and great benefitsliulpbrppAt Path Robotics we love coming to work to solve interesting and tough challenges but also because our ideas are welcomed and valued We encourage unique thinking and are dedicated to creating a diverse and inclusive environment All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion gender gender identity or expression sexual orientation national origin genetics disability age or veteran statusp
